website_summaries.verdict: Compact but powerful, this ozone generator can freshen large and small areas without a struggle.
pros: Meets or exceeds its advertised ozone output of 4,500 milligrams per hour
Ozone plates are inexpensive to replace
Does an excellent job removing baked-in odors from smoke, mold, and other contaminants
cons: Runs loud, especially after significant use
Chemical smell may linger for days after multiple full-cycle treatments

website_summaries.verdict: When you get serious about odor and mold problems, this option is efficient, rugged, and very effective.
pros: Commercial grade ozone generator that is available in several colors
Covers up to 4,000 square feet.Constructed of industrial grade steel
Low maintenance, with no filters to clean
cons: you can't just run it in the background
The ozone plate is inconsistent, and doesn't light all the way up

customer_reviews.title: Warning possible fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in May 2016 worked fine when I used it about a few times a month. However recently we turned it on and it started smoking and it was clearly Catching Fire Inside had to turn off and unplug. Went to the website for service and saw that it only has a 60-day guarantee. Warning fire hazard. Since you are supposed to leave the room when turning on this product, we were very lucky that it didn't set the house on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fry

customer_reviews.title: Ozone is like bleach for air(very similar method of action) and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, used it 4 times so far for different things, cleaned the smells out of the rooms permanently. On a side note, this is no joke or toy. Ozone is like bleach for air(very similar method of action) and this puts off a lot of it, enough to do serious immediate harm to your lungs if you do not respect it. Read up on ozone before using this, then read some more, then make a plan, then use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working ok. Although the light board ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working ok. Although the light board inside looks as if only about 2/3 of it is actually lit. UPDATE- 6/2/18. I’ve turned this thing in maybe 10 times in the last year and now the ligjtniqrd inside is almost completely out. This unit has been in a temperature and humidity controlled room the entire time I’ve owned it. Doesn’t work and is obviously poorly built junk. DO NOT WASTE MONEY ON THIS!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Owned several different ionizers over the years. Usually, it seems like you get what you pay for. I’ve been running this unit for two months. I have it connected to a timer so that it runs in my basement for about 30 min every night. It started out working great. It combated any mildew smells and worked like it should. It’s now two months latter and at best, it operated at 10% of its new level. My advice. Don’t waste your money, It’s too cheap to be true
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Good Item, but the plate started to show dead cells.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good with the output and power. Helps to eliminate odors very well. However, I reduced the stars because the plate seem to be having more and more dead cells. I have used the generator in 4 sessions of 30-60 mins and if plate will be inactivating at this rate it will be dead at around another 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: arunciks

customer_reviews.title: Really cranks out the O3!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Product works exceptionally well. It is great for really blasting an area to get rid of smell or mold but since the concentration cannot be measured by this unit, it is important to let it dissipate before re-entering the room. If you can smell it, keep waiting. Known safe levels are just past the threshold of smell detection. The Bad: Mine had obviously been opened and possibly used before. It was very dusty and has scuff marks. I did not pay for a USED unit. If the seller, OION, would like to partially reimburse me, I will be happy to change to 5 stars. Product was listed as NEW and clearly is not.
customer_reviews.author: BassMint

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a smell when done using it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a tractor cab that the mice had gotten into. I removed all traces of the mice and painted any surfaces that were metal to seal the odor. I then still has a smell coming from the vents so I purchased the ozone generator. I have used it several times for at least an hour at a time and still have the odor. I also had the odor produced by the ozone generator. not very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: lighteningxflash

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Span
customer_reviews.text: This item didn't last long, It stopped running quickly, I would choose another product based on the durability of this product.
customer_reviews.author: toolengineer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. The unit I ordered came with a completely defective timer — if you twisted the timer knob to put it at the desired setting it would simply spring back to zero when you released the knob. The timer was totally broken and non-usable. Sent back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: HCTB

customer_reviews.title: Made the room stink worse
customer_reviews.text: I have a room with some pet stains. To ensure I didn't have smell from them I tried this ozone generator. The smell from the ozone generator was worse than the pet stain smell. The smell from it would hang and not go away. I had the window open all day to try and remove the smell and I could still smell it at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Answer to odors: Enerzen commercial Ozone odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We were on vacation and we had raccoons in the attic... one dead! The odor was nauseously sweet!!! I did Everything to get the odor out of the house... Enerzen was the answer. It took multiple uses but came through. My daughter borrowed it and ended up purchasing one for herself to use in her rentals to eliminate cooking, smoking and pet odors.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Brown

customer_reviews.title: amazing.  Cheap money.  Landlords best friend
customer_reviews.text: I had some nasty nasty tennants that smoked in a carpeted room and had a cat. I had a cloth headboard bed frame in the room and a wooden ceiling with insulation above it. All kinds of area to hold that nasty cigarette smell. Well I shampooed the carpets and left the v windows open for a few days. that helped. Then i let this bad boy do it's thing for 90 min a whamo.... no more smoke or cat smell at all. Holy moly why didn't I buy this thing years ago! Landlords best friend! Seriously if I could only use this for one room it would be worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ozone is hazardous, doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.text: ASTHMA SUFFERERS: You can get serious attacks from just slightly elevated levels of ozone in the house. My wife and I both have asthma, and noticed an immediate effect when we were running this in an isolated room in our house. Used this to clean up after a roommate moved out, and we did a deep clean, including scrubbing the walls. Generator didn't "deodorize" the room, turns out ozone just smells clean. Odor remains, almost a year later, with some ozone smell mixed in.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I buy this model in particular once a year... the first time around in 2017... I bought it and it worked flawlessly all year long. Amazing. This time around. I bought it in October 2018, and it stopped working. No longer can you hear the electrical zapping noise it gives, when it turns out, hence it stopped omitting the ozone deodorizer. If there's a way to contact customer service for this product and anyone know? I'll appreciate your help.
customer_reviews.author: Javii Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality components
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and it lasted 7 months and died. Purchased a second unit along with Amazon extended warranty. Unit arrived March 6th, 2018. Plugged it in and started using it. Unit died on July21st. This is in a residential home used in accordance with acceptable use. Poor quality components. Now I have 2 dead units and am trying to get Amazon Warranty to replace it. AVOID this product.
customer_reviews.author: Unswitchable2

customer_reviews.title: Great product idea, design and built, poor components
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for the time being. Review will be either upgrade or downgraded based on Seller response. Awaiting it. Product been in use for about 5-6 hours around the house, mostly crawl space and garage. Yes, it definitely changes how those places smell, However, discharge plate started deteriorate, just after 5-6 hours? About 5-10% of cells are dead. Anyway, will see how seller responds and update review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a dollar
customer_reviews.text: Not worth a dollar I’m a car dealer I bought this hoping that I can remove the smoke odor from one of my cars I treated it twice three Hours each time that I treated the car with still no difference whatsoever I could’ve used odor illuminator spray better than this machine what a waste of money and time
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to remove lingering pet odor from my trucks interior. It simply does not create any effect at all. After three separate treatments I have concluded that this is a useless piece of equipment that does nothing but push air through a heater....this unit will NOT remove pet odors from vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Roanoke va usa

customer_reviews.title: Short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Enerzen commercial ozone generator worked well during the one-hour initial operation, eliminating room odors and replacing them with clean, pleasant smell that lasted a few days. Subsequent use, though, gradually and considerably diminished its effectiveness by several degrees even if operation time was cut to half hour, then 20 minutes. By the third time, heavy unpleasant smell was coming from the device and lingering for a few days. When not in use, the immediate area surrounding the unit smelled like the same gas that it emitted initially--a likely indication of leak. By the third use, the unit had completely lost its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Kia as a commuter for cheap and it was filthy on the inside, smells of smoke and inscents and whatever else. Removed all the interior and had it all vacuumed and steam cleaned but it still smelled. Tried car fresheners and frabreez but no luck. Put this in it for an hour and was shocked it’s now completely odorless! Wish I would’ve bought one sooner. Also works great inside the house to reduce the smell of our 2 dogs by using it occasionally. Only downside is the ozone smell but it’s only there for a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W

customer_reviews.title: Great ozone generator.
customer_reviews.text: This is big enough to do a whole house. I had another unit that died that I used as a air freshener, this isn't that type. There is no adjustment for how much ozone. Just a on/off. I used it to remove cigarette smoke odor from a car I bought. I ran it for an hour with doors closed and the vents on. The smell is gone. This does a great job but I must warn you this isn't a toy. Don't use it in your house while your in it. This is a shock treatment not a use all the time ozone generator.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in Eliminating Smoke Odor
customer_reviews.text: We left something on the kitchen stove over night and filled the house with smoke and burn smell. Our house has a lot of raw wood and other absorbent material. We first ran this for one hour in the worst room. The immediate effect was very good after following the instructions carefully (clear out plants and pets and ventilate afterwards). However, the odor came back. We then did sessions of two, three and three hours in places where the ozone would get into our air handling system. The odor decreased with each session, but always came back a little less than previously. So it has taken time, but I believe this product has been helpful in the odor elimination process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Should have stayed away although, I needed something & even with ignoring others bad experience I bought it any way. Of course my mistake! Here it is March 23 2019 & it is DOA and have probably used it an average of once a month and now now longer does the ultra violet light come on to my surprise because every time before it worked.
customer_reviews.author: NRR0710

customer_reviews.title: It worked 3 times, but not after that.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the week I had it cleaning up the smoke smell after a bedroom fire, and again the second time at the same location. Then it worked great cleaning up the cigarette smell in an empty apartment for a couple of days. That is the last time it worked. You normally see the ceramic plates having a slight glow when it's running, but they do not glow like that anymore. The fan runs, but no glow, no clean.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Completely eliminated pet odors!
customer_reviews.text: I love when a product exceeds my expectations. My previous tenants let their pets potty all over the carpet. We removed the carpet and padding when we finally got rid of them and bleached and pet enzyme treated the sub floors. Unfortunately, after laying new LVP flooring, I could still smell the nasty pet odor. I ordered the Enerzen Ozone Generator in hopes it would help. I treated my 2000 sq ft house for 3 hours - and then returned later that evening. NO ODOR WHATSOVER!!! I treated it again the next day just to give it a double whammy. I still haven't smelled any odors. This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Hall

customer_reviews.title: The smell is gone
customer_reviews.text: Removed tobacco smell from my car in 30 minutes. Pulled car in driveway...put device on arm rest set to 30 minutes, set car fan on high recirculate, ran cord out the bottom of door, closed all windows, plugged extension cord into wall. My car auto shut the engine at 30 minutes then i used the fob to open the windows to let it ventilate for a few hours after treatment because ozone is toxic. Then i took it for a drive on the freeway with all windows open. Luckily ozone has a short half life. Works great the smell is gone...just be careful you don't want to breath ozone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead ozone generator after 5 or 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: I uses this a handful of times to remove odors from my back office. About 600sqft. It worked great the first time I ran it but it seemed to lose some of its power the second and third time. Now when I turn it on it is nothing more than a fan in a box. The ozone plate inside does nothing at all. I would return it but it is beyond Amazons return window.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Timer doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today. I wanted to only run it for 20 mins the first time due to some of the other reviews about a chemical or burnt metal smell (which I definitely noticed unpacking it). I set the Time for 20 mins and left the house. Came back and hour later, after giving it 40 mins to air out as per the safety instructions, and it was still running. Seems like a pretty important feature, not sure how I can use this safely. Will be the first time I have ever requested a refund from an Amazon order.
customer_reviews.author: Wade gmail

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in October 2018 and only used it every other month (for about 1.5 hours per session). It's now May 2019 and it doesn't work. The fan turns on but it does not remove the odors. That distinct smell that it produced isn't there anymore. If this product lasted longer than seven months it would be worth it. Maybe mine is just defective but I doubt I'll get a replacement. Maybe invest in another brand. Not worth buying replacement plates this early into the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works well in a 300 sq ft apartment but not as powerful as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly effective. Used to remove smoke odor from a 300 Sq Ft studio apartment. I tried cleaning everything with vinegar and used 3 lbs of baking soda placed in pans around the apartment with no effect. I got this Ozoneator and ran it for 1 hour just as said by the instructions and the odor was reduced but still present. I ran it the next day for 3 hours and the smell is barely detectable. It works well and I am happy with the purchase! The timer is a bit off and runs out faster than it is set for. It is not as strong as advertised but does the job. If needed I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ChapWife

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far and it did well. I had a bedroom that was odorous and growing mold on the wall adjacent to the bathroom from a flooding issue along with a few dog accidents. I turned my whole house ac unit off, set it for one hour, then sealed the space under the door with a rolled towel. There was a slight clorox scent left behind but the other smell is completely gone and the mold on the walls has started to recede. I will do this treatment again to ensure the mold stays away. BOTTOM LINE: I'd say it does well. Thanks for an affordable solution to ridding my home of mold and odor!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna C

customer_reviews.title: DIED after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit, the first one made it about a year, this one died after a few months, conveniently right after the "warranty" expired. The quality and "craftsmanship" is junk. The older model was built with higher quality materials, like steel and hard plastic knob, and LED that works, etc. Unless you hate money, skip t his brand.
customer_reviews.author: toddPB

customer_reviews.title: Box was ok but product was broken on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Box was ok but product was broken on the inside as picture shows. A little irritating because I had been waiting on it to get the smell out of a customers car and now I have to tell customer I can't.
customer_reviews.author: sidney e lanier

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly effective, possibly concerningly so.
customer_reviews.text: In a matter of minutes my entire home smelled like an Office Depot. Five stars, would office depot again. Seriously though, it annihilated the basement musty smell I was having. I'm impressed and a little concerned. Research on O3 seems to strongly urge that you remove all living things from the area you're going to operate this thing. They're not kidding, I accidentally got a face full of O3 while the unit was on and my throat has had a bit of a tickle since (30 minutes ago, and it's fading fast, I'll be fine) but wow, this thing really pulls its weight. Use as directed, exercise caution and aim away from face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a terrible & persistent chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: I used this device once in a small-ish room in my house to remove a musty odor from several items which I put in the room. The musty odor is gone, but in its place is a very strong chemical odor. I have been airing the room out for several weeks, and it has been making only a minor difference. I'm not sure if the odor is trapped in the walls or the furniture. Febreeze and air fresheners have not helped. The room is, at this time, unusable. I returned this machine. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this works!
customer_reviews.text: A neighbor told me about this machine, and thank goodness. A rental tenant had a dog living in the garage and it smelled disgusting even a year after the dog was gone. This machine cleaned the smell away after one three hour use. Wow. I'm using it to get rid of the "mud" smell of new drywall also. I need to rent this machine out to friends and family. I'll definitely use it before my parents visit for the weekend (dog smell). You do need to ensure the no one is around when the machine is being used, and to air the space out very well afterward. You do not want to breathe in the O3.
customer_reviews.author: QC28105

customer_reviews.title: Made the odor worse
customer_reviews.text: My cat peed in my car. The first time, I ran the unit for 20 minutes with the car windows up. It seemed the urine smell was decreased somewhat, but it left a different odor that's hard to describe, but equally as unpleasant. A few days later I ran the unit again for 30 minutes with the same outcome. I can still smell the cat pee, and now I have this other weird smell on top of it. I am sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: MLC427

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced the air cleaning of ozone in the past, never had I imagined I'd buy an ozone machine. My decision was when my auto detailer guy offered the service for an additional $25 and it only take 5 minutes. I figured they were so expensive, so....I check Amazon. Easy choice, I just bought it. No regrets. I've used it in many applications including at work when we got a load of $1 bills that smelled terrible. Bathrooms, cars, shoes (didn't work so well, but they were really terrible), office, a safe (after the $1 bills stank it up). I'd recommend this! It works great.
customer_reviews.author: El Luchador

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have utilized this in a car and a camper. So far it has worked as advertised. I am keeping track of the time in case it dies an early death. Scent is typical ozone generator, but dissipates with time. Customer service has been responsive, usually within a day or so. I asked about the replacement ozone plates and they were able to send me a link for them. I purchased two for spares, (you never know). The plates sent did not resemble those in the picture and am awaiting a response from customer service as I know that can be an issue. This is the link for the replacement ozone plates:
customer_reviews.author: Marty T

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved into my in-laws bunkhouse while our new house is being built and had to do some minor renovations. We discovered cats and raccoons have been using the space above the ceiling as a littler box. You can imagine the odor since this has been going on for years. I bought this item because of all the great reviews and believe me after a week of use, it removed all the odors from the 800sqft room. I definitely recommend this item for any odor issues you may have.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger S. Ruiz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me. Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a car that had been sitting a while. Car was detailed, but still had a smell so I tried this. Multiple times. It didn’t do a single thing to the smell at all. Didn’t matter how many hours I ran it. I’m not sure how everyone else had such great success with theirs but mine is Terri me.
customer_reviews.author: Dx3

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I left a case of water in our camper and they sweated which caused a damp area on the carpet with then turned into mildew. Even once it was dried out it still smelled bad and bothered my allergies. I ran this gem for a couple hours and it took care of the odor and the allergy problem!
customer_reviews.author: C. Scarpitti

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival..
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 30 min ago. Ozone plate was broken and rattling around inside the machine.. (white "glue"?) smeared all inside. returning. Also, pics are incorrect. Seller misrepresentation? Refurb?
customer_reviews.author: WSD2

customer_reviews.title: Was going to destroy, instead will convert to "She-shed"
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased a home that had been occupied by smokers for 30+ years. We had looked at renting a unit, but for around the price of a rental could purchase this. Fantastic buy. It eliminated the smell in the house so we decided to try and use it on a barn that was destined for destruction due to the horrible smell of cat urine. The barn is now considered use-able and will turn into a "She-shed" all thanks to this Ozone generator. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jenn bush

customer_reviews.title: Basement odor
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try and help with the 'musty' basement odor. I figured I'd have to use it a couple times to get rid of the odors since basement mustiness is typically a recurring issue. So far, 1 treatment and the basement is tolerable!! I probably should do another, but hey, it is close enough. I'm fairly impressed!. I have a fairly large basement (1856 sq ft), semi-open, and used the unit one time and the improvement was amazing. I do worry about human and animal exposure to the ozone, that is why I haven't bothered with a second treatment yet. But, yeah, it does help with the musty odors of a basement!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Lab & Office Disinfection
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these units to sanitize and disinfect our wastewater lab and water office during the COVID-19 pandemic while we were out of the buildings. Also use them in our garages for the vehicles. Small price for some assurance during this difficult time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Created a horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Used the unit in our master bedroom. Set the unit timer for 45 minutes and returned about 3 hours later. There was a horrible (nosxious) smell. Opened all the windows like recomended and also turned on the ceiling fan. We couldn't go back into the room, for more than a couple of minutes, for 3+ days. Didn't see it before I purchased but, after went an looked and saw others experienced this as well. Don't know if it was but, it seemed like it was unsafe to be in the room as bad as the smell was. Returned and purchased air purifier instead. Be cautious if using one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Ozone Generator Killed The Odor
customer_reviews.text: Science is both weird and confusing at times. An Ozone Generator? Really?! Yes! Yes, this is a real thing and this Ozone Generator works wherever you need it. My father used the Ozone Generator inside a musty vehicle. The device cleared the smell and it never came back (according to my mother). The device has many applications, do your 'googling' and Amazon it!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Works great, quality machine
customer_reviews.text: Have had several animals in the house for years so now that we are selling, we wanted to make sure non-pet people wouldn’t end up with stinky rooms. Ran this machine for 3 hours at a time in all the rooms, probably run 30 cycles so far on 3 hours each, still works great. We don’t need to keep doing it, the rooms don’t smell to us like animals anymore, but since we are showing the house every day we have been running it at nights just to make sure. Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get the cat feces and urine smell out of our work shop out on the farm. My father thinks it's just fine having farm cats in the shop but he refuses to take care of the mess they make. So I'm stuck changing the litter box. But I'm busy and can't do it everyday. Well the cats stink up the place. I put this in the 15'x25' with a 12' high ceiling shop area for about 4 hours aired it out and the smell was vertually gone. So I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Stormbreath

customer_reviews.title: Smells clean like a home should
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a mold problem after a water leak. The smell after running it for 90 minutes was all gone! We turned it on and left the home for a total of 5 hours when we got back the smell was fresh and clean no more mold smell, it was completely gone. After one treatment our home now smells fresh and clean going on 4 days now and no returned smell. I will update if needed but for now 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: The older I get the more it takes to impress me...
customer_reviews.text: Flawless order and item received directly on the date expected. After two uses of this product, I'll tell you one thing...I've NEVER been so impressed by a product in my life! I was entirely doubtful, but hopeful upon ordering. I have zero doubts and my hopes have all been fulfilled. This does exactly as advertised and eliminates all orders like a champ in both small and large areas. If you are in the market for any similar product just stop searching and hit buy now!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Waltz

customer_reviews.title: This is a miracle product that works trust the reviews if you have a stink this will get rid of it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a miracle magic product! We have an old truck has been rained on for years and it set up this horrible stinky moldy inside the after repeated washings detailing and everything else you could think of still smell like a sewer. After 90 minutes of treatment the owners were completely and absolutely gone and follow up two weeks later they are still gone! This product is dirt cheap it works only thing good for destroying others permanently not just simply masking them.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Device should be ILLEGAL
customer_reviews.text: This ozone generator has created a metallic smell which is much worse than original fire smell and has caused a major concern now in the living in the house. After googling probable causes, and the EPA review, this device should be ILLEGAL. It is incredibly dangerous and could ruin furniture, toys, and carpets. Not worth the potential health risk to mask odor!
customer_reviews.author: Rashed Aboudan

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My friend's car got skunked (don't ask) and a month later the smell was still there despite everything he did to air it out. We put the ozone generator in there for 40 minutes and afterwards, it smelled like a swimming pool, but the skunk smell was gone and hasn't returned so far. He says it's magic. :) I bought it to put in a musty crawlspace, but haven't done it yet. We'll see if it works as well on that as it did in the car... So far, I'm pretty impressed. It takes a while for the chlorine smell to dissipate after you use it, so be prepared to air the area out well afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use on my 44’ boat I keep down in the Florida Keys. It works great. It can get really moldy on the boat when we’re away. I set it to 120 mins, when I leave, and run it again when I return. We sent it, and go out to dinner on our return. 4 hours or later we return to a fresher, must lest mildew smelling floating home. It’s powerful so I wouldn’t run it while I’m there, and you want to wait a few hours after for it to dissipate. Great product we’ve been using it since Sep. 2017. No problems, I would recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph V. Rome Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pandemic Gift
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this machine for our daughter's pre-K classroom. She sets it to clean the air for an hour after she leaves school each day. She says the room smells wonderful, fresh each morning, when she arrives, as opposed to its normal odors. This is her 27th years of teaching and classroom smells are familiar to her. Also, she is convinced it not only removes scents, but germs from the room. So far, none of the 20 children in her class have had a problem with the virus and this is their third week of school. She really likes this impromptu gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Works for cat smell
customer_reviews.text: I had a roommate for a while with a cat. When they left, the bedroom stank. I have used this unit several times over a few days and the smell is almost gone. By the way: do not mess around with ozone. It is basically a toxic gas. I actually used a 3m respirator with filters designed for ozone when entering the room after running the unit. Cheap investment for your lung health.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: Our unfinished basement had flooded several times when the sump ...
customer_reviews.text: Our unfinished basement had flooded several times when the sump pump went out. Our cat also urinated all over the place and the smell was awful. We tried about everything to get rid of the smell without success. I ran this unit for an hour and it completely got rid of the smell. I run a "touch up" every week or so for about 20 minutes and it continues to keep the smell away.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: This machine really works well!
customer_reviews.text: Got a lot of advice from the internet but I needed this for a used truck. I ran it for 30 min the first time and that seemed too long for the truck large interior. NO NOT get in the vehicle with this running, let the vehicle air out for an hour after use. I then ran it for 15 minutes with the AC on. I did this a couple more times over the first week. AC on, AC off, blower on. We don't smell anything at all now. It does eliminate any smell. I'm sure it would work in a house a room at a time no problem. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buying this Ozone Gererator again, I keep loaning it out!
customer_reviews.text: This Ozone Generator has to be my number one, online, favorite and most used purchase in years. I have asthma and it is light and compact enough to take with me to my daughters' homes to use while I stay a few days, since I am allergic to their house pets. My neighbors use it to erase the smoke odor from their homes and cars, I use it in my home crawlspace to eliminate mold, another allergy. Fish for dinner, turn on the Ozone Generator problem solved. I never am without it, except when I loan it out, so now I am having to order another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last As Long As it Should for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I tend to wait until I have used an item for a while before writing a review as even the most useless products will work the first day. I have used this product for several months now and was pleased at the performance at first, but the effectiveness began to wear off quickly and now has stopped doing what it was designed for. It appears to still run, but no longer removes odor from even the smallest room, just makes the standard loud noise. I will be looking for a different brand to replace this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Hunting Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my scent control for hunting. I just brought it with me on a hunting trip to GA. The guys at camp made fun of it at first but once they saw how it worked they all brought their gear into my room to get "treated". I told the guys I didn't want to go into the woods tomorrow morning smelling like the pork chops we grilled the night before. This thing is powerful. I'll run it in the room with the door closed and I only need to run it for about 10 min and everything smells fresh after. It is now part of my everyday hunting routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The other reviews were accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I ran it twice. Once for 90 minutes, and another for 120. It worked and I cant believe it. I had a horrible mildew smell, and I couldn't take it anymore. I was nervous about this because of the dangers of misuse. I bought a remote control outlet, and started the unit when I was out of the apartment and came back hours after it was done. No health effects. I have bad allergies, and I hope it will help with that too. I will update on that soon. To the makers of this device. I thank you! I tried everything and was so relieved when this worked.
customer_reviews.author: derp

customer_reviews.title: Clear the house.
customer_reviews.text: This ozone generator kills all smells. It is unhealthy for animals so not for houses with pets that can’t be removed while device runs. It clears medicinal marijuana smells from my 800 sq ft condo in 20 minutes. It also eliminates the funky smells that come from the pets artificial turf pee pads and bedding. I run this for an hour each morning while walking the dogs. It keeps my neighbor from complaining about the smell of my medication in the mornings. The ozone smell it leaves behind dissipates quickly when the air circulation flows from fan or central air system.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get the pet smell out of the room. This worked but it makes everything kind of smell like bleach, which is probably better than the smell you’re trying to get rid of. You will need to put a towel under the door and block any vents because you will quickly smell it all over the house. You don’t want to be in the room when you’re running it because it kind of stings to breath in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What matter of sorcery is this?
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkable product. I bought a used car that sat around for most of 2.5 years and had some strong musty smell along with some lingering cigarette smoke smell. 45 mins of treatment with this machine and 45 minutes to air things out and the odors are gone, leaving a faint chlorine/bleach smell that has dissipated substantially over a couple of hours. I've been told I might need to use it a couple of times, but the initial use had nearly miraculous results. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Newman

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, but seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a couple times, but surprised at how buzzy it is. Not a huge issue considering the area is to be unoccupied, but it's a bit disconcerting when you turn it on. Other than that, seems like it's working. I am doing multiple short duration (30 min) runs on a 4 door car that had water damage.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W

customer_reviews.title: Is as described
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. However, upon further research using o3 as a sanitizer is debatable. There isn't enough research to make a solid statement. That being said, this works great to bring that fresh mountain air smell into any space. I love using it, but I also keep my distance while it is running. Be cautious of exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Did everything I could’ve possibly hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my room, as my mother and sister wouldn’t stop complaining about it having a “boy smell”. I don’t know what they expected after making three teenage males share a 14’x12’’ room. But this thing! Dang! Once you use it, it leaves behind a certain smell, but that smell would be better described as a complete absence of any scent whatsoever. It turned the air in the room into a clean slate that you could easily turn into whatever sent you wanted. Burn a few sticks of incense after, pop open a Renuzit gel air freshener, and you’ll smell nothing but that for months, this machine worked absolute wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I’m a believer
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with musty smells in my house for many, many years. I have used every kind of plug in air freshener, spray freshener, with very short-term results. I bought this and was hesitant to use it, because I was afraid of it. Finally I bit the bullet and I’m kicking myself for waiting so long. THIS LITTLE UNIT TOTALLY ELIMINATES BAD SMELLS. I truly can’t believe how it works. I will stress that, having a minor in chemistry, I did respect the 2 hour window of not entering the area after the unit times off. The smell that lingers is kind of like a cold metal smell. Just clean.
customer_reviews.author: P. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Gets Rid of Odors
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how well this worked. We have a couple of rooms in our home that just continually smell musty, due to lack of air circulation. After 4 days, we are still good, however, there is definitely a dissipation of clean air smell. If I only have to run this for a short while once a week, I will be happy. While instructions clearly state to use in an unoccupied room, if you have your AC or furnace fan running while using it in a closed room,you will find out you need to shut that AC and fan off, so it doesn't circulate through the house if you are home.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This thing smells awful, after Everytime running it for just 30min you need to air out the area for an hour because otherwise it causes headaches. But after airing out for an hour odors do seem to be better for a couple days. But it also only lasted about 2 months and has already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: cieandra

customer_reviews.title: A deadly delight odor eliminator!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Moly.....bought a used vehicle previously owned by a smoker. Ran this for 1 hr and 45 minutes and this thing eliminated the smell. I'll be doing two more runs just for the heck of it....a little overkill I know but....damn this worked like a charm. Just don't breath the ozone...its seriously dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on some reviews by professionals on here. It does what it's supposed to do, the only thing is that ozone itself has an odd odor. I used this in my basement to get rid of the cat litter smell and also after my sump pump failed and I had water intrusion. It does eliminate odors, but the ozone smell is weird and it takes some ventilating to get rid of it. Overall I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Commercial use
customer_reviews.text: We like this this machine, it does elimnate odors. This cannot be used when a human or animal is in the house, so know this in advance. You have to set the timer, leave the house, and then allow extra time before you come back. Read the directions if you get it.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work really well. However not really sure. I do suggest you do a study and research ozone generators as they need to be used properly. I use it for odor, mold and even insects. As mentioned it does seem to work, however for longer usage, (more than 2 hours) you will need a separate timer. Make sure you give it enough time to refresh before you enter the room.
customer_reviews.author: ICONMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a leak in our camper, when the flush valve on the toilet blew. We put fans in the camper, turned on the vent fan, opened all windows and lower access panels. After a week the water was gone, but there was still a musty smell in the camper. We decided to give this ozone generator a try. We put this ozone generator in the camper and closed the windows and vents. We ran it unit it timed out and let it sit for two hours. The smell in the camper was gone! For good measure, we restarted the ozone generator again and let the camper sit over night. The camper smelled fresh and clean the next day!
customer_reviews.author: RS657

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic plates didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Received on Jan. 2. I don't use this regularly, I think the unit probably has less than 12 hours total use on it, and the ceramic plates are already needing replacement. When it works, it works spectacularly. But the reliability has me concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Guidry

customer_reviews.title: The odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product when a customer smoked in my motel room which was non-smoking. It was an older room which had some other odors. Ran this baby and it got rid of them all. The only drawback (not going to take a star away from the review) is that you must ventilate the room to get rid of the ionizing smell. A small price to pay for a product that does a big job! Next test is taking odors out of vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Oakland Motel

customer_reviews.title: Great result for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used in a 1100 square foot duplex that smelled funky - smokey. I set for the limit (3 hours) and found a definite "better" rating. I did it 2 more times (at 3 hours), but never got much better long term. Then I closed off the carpeted bedrooms and did them one at a time for 3 hours. That smaller area with the soft surface seemed to respond well and gave the place an over-all better result. For the money, I was very pleased and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yrbkmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: I never write review, but ironically always read them on the products I buy. I will tell you this product is worth it. We bought a Honda Ridgeline for our son. Unfortunately the previous owner was a smoker. We tried shampooing the carpet and upholstery. We changed the cabin air filter, We kept the windows open for hours at a time, etc. Nothing would get the smell out. Two 45 minute applications later and it was like a brand new car. I was skeptical but I will tell you I am totally shocked. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: cdogsmom

customer_reviews.title: air cleaner of mold and smells.
customer_reviews.text: kills musty mold smell in our basement, smoke odors gone, when i ran a motel we used them to clear out smoke from non smoking rooms, onion and food smells. got this one for my home. use it monthly in various rooms and places. it doesnt cover the smell it creates ions that attach to the smells to change their make up. i would suggest this one because its easily portable for anywhere you need it, unlike otuers that stay in ne place. strong mold takes a couple of rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was looking for something to clean the mold in my house. I run it for 30 min about once a week.it cleans the air for my whole house. A large single story 4-2. I also have three dogs. After is runs it makes the house like it's been outside playing. We are less congestive and no longer have a mold issue. I will say this as a warning don't get zealous and decide to run it for two hours if you plan on being in the house. It can cause a feeling of heaviness in the chest. Worth it and the money
customer_reviews.author: Faith Stortz

customer_reviews.title: After a rainshower smell
customer_reviews.text: Do hotels use some version of this technology?? If you want your home to smell fresh after a rainstorm, poolside without the chlorine then get this. I wish id know about this before, i3ts amazing. We have a small cape cottage that had been left empty over a winter and developed that distinct musty smell. After one half hours initial use the house smells great just super fresh and clean. Only the first round so basement smell might come back at some point but this is a great start and it really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Test it right away
customer_reviews.text: This worked great until it stopped working yesterday unfortunately the return window on this ended Nov 1st and I received it on oct 2nd but didn't first use it until the end of October . So now I'm left with a machine that doesn't work and no way of returning it
customer_reviews.author: natally Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to kill germs in my office and smell with patients coming in and out all day The office has a basement which also adds to the odor. I have been using this for several days and it clearly makes a difference when we come into the office the next morning. The office smells clean. You can NOT use this while the office is occupied and this included pets. it clearly causes respiratory distress. I like it an will continue to use it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets buying this
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. I used it in a basement that had a musty smell. I fixed the moisture problem, but the smell remained I tried airing it out with fans I tried aerosol sprays but the smell didn’t go away until I got this. It quickly filled the basement with ozone I could smell it at the top of the steps to the basement. It gets to areas that you can’t reach or see to kill odor. When I bought it I I didn’t know if it would work but it does. I could even smell ozone coming from the vents on the main floor so as a bonus it removed any odors that could be in duct work too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well lasted only a month
customer_reviews.text: It worked great 4 times then died. I would turn it before work let it run a couple of hours then autoshut off. I used it once a week for a month before it quit working. The unit was stationary on cabinet. Not dropped or anything. I love it while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: If you have smells, read on!
customer_reviews.text: Our sump pump quit and we didnt know. At least two hours or more went by as the water kept coming. It was about 1 to 2 inches of sewer water and oh my gosh it STUNK so bad. We removed all of the water and used our machine. I kid you not, 15 minutes and it started to smell good. Next day, there still was a little smell. We ran machine one hour and it smelled like a flower field. So it took 2 to 3 days to get our basement smelling great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bedington63

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 4 months used it 6 times now ozone plate wont fir just fan runs
customer_reviews.author: David Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergy season because it kills pollen
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. Was told you couldn't get much for this price. Wrong! It works so well that I have to get out of the room asap and hold my breath to not breathe the ozone. tt made my stinky attic room so fresh that when my daughter's family visited this past weekend, she couldn't smell anything. Great for allergy season because it kills pollen! kills mold! kills dust mites! Granddaughter threw up in that room this weekend and so it will be run again on Monday. Cannot be run with people, animals or plants in the room and must be aired out to reenter.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient tool to remove cigarettes smell
customer_reviews.text: My rental property filled with cigarettes smell after smoking tenant moved out. I called some special treatment company and was told that it costs several thousands dollars to remove the smells. I searched Internet and found this ozone generator. I set the AC/Heat to off and fan on so that the room air circulates. I set the timer to 30 min and when I came back one hour later, the cigarettes smell is all gone. It's magic and well worth the dollar I paid.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool little device
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this machine to remove a strong odor from the trunk of my car. It turned out to be a moldy carpet but before discovery, it could have seemed like my car was involved in some sketchy activity. We ran this device a total of 2 different three hour increments and one overnight run. Recently, I used this in my house as well to freshen up the place.
customer_reviews.author: BRGR

customer_reviews.title: This Worked Beautifully At Removing Car Odor!
customer_reviews.text: We had a rotten watermelon that was mistakenly left in our car where it stayed for over a week. After having the interior professionally cleaned, the odor was still there. Deodorizers failed. We purchased this ozone machine and in one 30-minute treatment, the odor was gone! A professional car detailer charges almost $400 for ozone treatment. This machine saved us a LOT of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used truck and the previous owner was a heavy smoker. (He/she has to be dead or close to death) It was so bad the water from the steam cleaner would turn yellow as well as the rags when I cleaned the dash. I tired every product out there that claimed to remove the smoke smell. Even tried baking soda and apples. Used the Ozone Generator for 30 mins and did this twice. Once with the A/C on and once with it off. It has been 3 weeks and the smell is still gone!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Banks

customer_reviews.title: Seems well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Been having a small odor problem the last few weeks where I’d catch a whiff of something sour when I walked in the door. Nothing major, and the initial whiff was all I ever got, but it bugged me either way. I wasn’t sure if it was something left from the flooding, or maybe from the well water, or God knows what else. So I decided to grab an air purifier/ozone generator. This one showed up today and seems to have been exactly what I needed! Turned it on this morning before I went to breakfast with a friend, and when I got back the whole apartment smells fresh and clean! Here’s hoping it stays that way now!
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'keefe

customer_reviews.title: Will eliminate smells!
customer_reviews.text: My van has experienced several catastrophic smell events. Gallon of milk left in the car, in August for 4 days, leaked seafood juice, watermelon left in the car......The machine eliminated ALL the smells. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lori T.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. We were amazed by how much the air was cleaned. My wife bought a used car without me. We are a nonsmoking couple. After the car was here a couple days, you could immediately smell what they tried to cover. Needless to say, heard of Enerzen Ozone generator and we gave it a shot. Replaced the cabin air filter and let it run. WOW!! It’s 98% gone!!! Reason I say 98% is because I have a cold, haha. My wife is super happy!!! We tried in rooms in our house where we know our little dog had accidentally left a mess. Funky Air was cleaned out as well. Very happy with the purchase. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: oran m burns

customer_reviews.title: Great product for smelly spots.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a house that was previously occupied by several cats. Need I say more? An ozone generator turned out to be the ONLY thing that removed the smell of a thousand litter boxes. This machine cleared a very pervasive smell from a 3000 square foot basement in 30 minutes. Since then, I've used it in a garage, a utility closet and even a funky cabinet that housed a bunch of smelly candles. It's amazing! The first impression is not of "no scent", in fact it leaves behind a very distinct, almost disinfected, odor. However this scent is gone in a day or two and no smell whatsoever is left behind. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Enerzen Commercial Ozone Generator 6,000mg Industrial O3 Air Purifier Deodorizer Sterilizer (6,000mg - Black)
feature_bullets: NEW & IMPROVED LARGER UNIT AND DESIGN – Over 6,000 mg of ozone production and a larger fan sterilizes more square footage. Commercial/Industrial Grade Ozone Generator - Low maintenance (NO filters to clean) and Portable Design (Compact and lightweight design means you can use the ozone generator virtually anywhere -- in your home, office, boat, car, just about anywhere!)
POWERFUL ODOR ELIMINATION – Eliminates virtually ANY mal-odors from cigarette/cigar smoke, pet odors, paint/cleaning fumes, dust, water damage, smoke damage, cooking odors, and other airborne odors.

COST AND ECO-FRIENDLY DESIGN – Ultra-low energy usage yields cost and energy savings. Industrial grade aluminum alloy casing will keep this purifier cleaning for years to come. This is USA 110V ONLY and includes a 1 year warranty.

NEW TIMER DESIGN – A newly improved timer is sturdier and allows you to control the length of purification time and includes a HOLD function. Please note that ALL ozone generators on the market are meant to be used in unoccupied spaces. For any questions or concerns, please contact us at customerservice@oionair.com
WARRANTY - Includes 1 year of manufacturer warranty. We stand behind our products and our warranty.
